components.description: May be impacted by SMS delivery issues

components.name: Customer Support Center
components.description: This includes services related to reaching support via phone, email, and chat.

incidents.name: SMS Delivery Delays to Tunisie Network in Tunisia

incident_updates.body: We are continuing to experience SMS delivery delays when sending messages to Tunisie Network in Tunisia. Our engineers are actively working with our carrier partner to resolve the issue. We will provide another update in 8 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - SMS, Middle East & Africa

incidents.name: Flex Insights Failing to Load for Multiple Customers

incident_updates.body: Flex Insights are now operating normally. We will continue to monitor for system stability. We'll provide another update in 2 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

affected_components.name: FLEX - Flex Insights

incident_updates.body: We are currently investigating an occurrence of HTTP 500 error while accessing Flex Insights. Our engineers are working on the issue, and we will provide another update in 2 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

affected_components.name: FLEX - Flex Insights

incident_updates.body: Our monitoring systems have detected a potential issue on Flex Insights. Our engineering team has been alerted and is actively investigating. We will update as soon as we have more information.

incidents.name: SMS Delivery Delays to Multiple Small Networks in US to a Subset of Short Codes and Toll Free Numbers

incident_updates.body: After monitoring for some time, we started seeing a degradation of service, and we are continuing to experience SMS delivery delays to multiple Small Networks in US to a Subset of Short Codes and Toll-Free Numbers. Our engineers are still working with our carrier partners to resolve the issue. We expect to provide another update in 8 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

scheduled_maintenances.name: United Kingdom Account Security Carrier Partner Maintenance - EE

incident_updates.body:
Our carrier partner EE UK is conducting a planned maintenance from 22 July 2024 at 14:00 PDT until 22 July 2024 at 20:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent API request failures for EE UK customers.

Impacted Products: Lookup Identity Match, Lookup SIM Swap, Legacy Identity MatchAndAttributes.

scheduled_maintenances.name: Authy and Verify V1 API - Maintenance

incident_updates.body: We’re conducting a planned Global maintenance between 15:00 to 15:30 Pacific Time on 08/03/2024. During the maintenance window, all Authy API requests will fail. Communicate to your customers (end users) about this planned downtime for maintenance before August 3, 2024. Due to Authy API’s deprecation (https://www.twilio.com/docs/verify/authy-vs-verify), we strongly encourage migrating to the Verify V2 API. Verify V2 API, specifically SMS/Voice OTP delivery, is unaffected by this maintenance downtime.
